mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two economics course numbers (ECON 302 and 421, see here: http://www.virginia.edu/registrar/records/04-05ugradrec/chapter6/chapter6-19.htm). Lyrics from country song "Need You Now," by Lady Antebellum. Along bottom right, first half of a graffiti calling for people who talk in the Stacks to be stoned to death, the second half of which is visible in the next entry. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
